==Trivia==

* {{W|Felipe Guaman Poma de Ayala}} was a {{W|Quechua people|Quechua}} nobleman known for chronicling and denouncing the ill treatment of the natives of the Andes by the Spanish Empire after their {{W|Spanish conquest of the Inca Empire|conquest of Peru}}.
